Text: you are so very kind ,i just like to show that there is still people out there that take the time to help out with no viruses and crap and with no need for payment ... and too say thanx for what i have been given.... so your all welcome and thanx also

@ Slickinator - I still do not understand how you get the patch to work? Can you download DvdFab to a folder on your desktop and then replace the patch or do you have to download DvdFab to you program files? It was much easier when there was a key! Can you help?
Thanks!

all u do is start the loader exe and use the clickable buttons then go in to the patch folder and double click the patch and it will open and you go direct it to where you installed the dvdfab and the dll file will be the only dll showing in the folder through the patch and click on the dll file and click open or patch
